CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.agency_product AS SELECT bl.id, res.name AS agency, rel.name AS relationship, p.name AS product, bl.notes, up.name AS updated_by, bl.update_date FROM agency_product bl JOIN agency res ON bl.agency = res.id JOIN relationship rel ON bl.relationship = rel.id JOIN product p ON bl.product = p.id JOIN agency up ON bl.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.agency_product OWNER TO core;
